cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 20th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 20th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Basic Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription:
This room features 1 x Single bed with access to shared bathroom facilities.

Located in a historic Hotel, all rooms are located on the first floor and are only accessible by stairs.

Please note that the price is based on 1 guest.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
This room features 1 x Queen bed with access to shared bathroom facilities.

Price is based on 2 guests. Maximum occupancy is 2

* Room pictures are an example of this room type. The room you book may differ from the photos.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
This room features 1 x Double bed with access to shared bathroom facilities.

The price is based on 2 guests. Maximum occupancy is 2 

* Room pictures are an example of this room type. The room you book may differ from the photos.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
This room features 2 x Single beds with access to shared bathroom facilities. Please note that the price is based on 2 guests. Maximum occupancy is 2 

* Room pictures are an example of this room type

privates.name: Basic 3 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
This room features 1 x Double bed and 1 x Single bed with access to shared bathroom facilities.

Please note that the price is based on a maximum of 3 guests.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
